alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Green Lake; Marquette; Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 18 at 5:27PM CST until February 18 at 6:30PM CST by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Southwestern Green Lake County in south central Wisconsin... Northern Columbia County in south central Wisconsin... Marquette County in south central Wisconsin... Northern Sauk County in south central Wisconsin... * Until 630 PM CST. * At 524 PM CST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from near Friendship to 6 miles southeast of Viroqua, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Poor visibility in heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. *This includes the following highways... Interstates 90 and 39. Locations impacted include... Baraboo, Portage, Reedsburg, Wisconsin Dells, Lake Delton, Pardeeville, Montello, West Baraboo, Westfield, Rio, Lawrence, Packwaukee, Wyocena, Mecan, Oxford, Endeavor, Neshkoro, La Valle, Rock Springs and Ironton. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.
